content.detailedDescription: At 5:30 pm in austin,tx observed 2 orbs close to the state capital bldg. i have a photo of them. as my wife and i were driving home in rush hour traffic, we saw extremely bright,glowing cigar shaped object. we were heading north on 183 in cedar park. the object was shimmering pale colors mostly pink and light orange. we got a picture of it and pulled over out of traffic. but when we got out of the vehicle it was gone. someone else must have seen this also.
content.summary: 2 events 30min.Apart,2 orbs next to capital bldg in austin,30 later observed hugh lite craft

content.detailedDescription: It was in the middle of the day heading to work.  12:14 pm. i stopped at a traffic light heading east.  i noticed an object in the air hovering, no lights, no sound, no glass.  it was there for approx. 5 seconds.  it was gone, disappeared.  told my co-workers, but nobody else.  i knew it as a ufo, and i'm not scared of ufo's.  i was elated that i saw my first ufo.
content.summary: Ufo had a frosty look to it  with pattern

content.detailedDescription: I am a newspaper motor carrier. just a few minutes before 4 am, the morning of saturday june 30th 2012, i was traveling westbound on east indiana highway 46, heading back to my hometown of greensburg indiana. i just completed my new point route, where a bright blue light suddenly appeared in the darkness, and captured my total attention.  i first looked down near the railroad track, on my left side,  thinking it might have been a local train. there were no reflective blue light above the treetops, where i typically would see a light of a train going through. at this 45 degree angle, where this light was, i pondered if this could have been fireworks, lightening, or a blown transformer. this object was so bright it was brighter than a football fields' stadium lights, and although as baby blue in color,i knew it could not have been fireworks or a transformer, as high up in altitude it was and how fireworks seemed to go up explode out and then dissipate. this seems to just appear out of nowhere and seemed almost as bright as a star and it's immense size seemed to be more than several city blocks in diameter by the depth of perception i saw from my car as i was going 55 miles per hour with no traffic, and a perfect view from my dashboard. the object  just disappeared out of plain sight within about 3 seconds. i wondered if i should call 911 as i thought this could have been like a bomb, and thought surely others may have seen it as well. then the rational thought of law enforcement hearing this case and them searching my vehicle was not a proper channel i thought i should take. i consulted a friend and decided to send this directly to mufon. i have no idea of what this object was or could be but i do know it is nothing that we have seen before.
content.summary: Massive emission of a bright blue light, 3 seconds duration, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was over near scranton high school at a restaurant sitting outside. when all of a sudden this bright white light appeared over the east mountain area i assume. you could see the towers on the mountain as well. this light was def brighter than the towers too. you could see it on top of the mountain. my boyfriend and i watched it for about 4 min then it just disappeared. just like that. scary feeling. nothing like we've seen before.
content.summary: Bright white light over the east mountain area

content.detailedDescription: Was at a local out door concert in the city with buildings around so i only have a limited view of the sky but when i looked up i noticed an object just cruising across the sky it looked far away and very close at the same time the color stayed constant at a yellowish orange very solid at the center and hazy around the edges the movement of the object didn't look to be out of the ordinary for a plane as far as speed and stayed in a relatively straight heading but that's where the similarity's ended its hard to describe what was up there because there was a emotional factor involved and it didn't look to be fully in our realm like a solid transparent object it was very strange and invigorating
content.summary: Odd seamless and soundless moving yellowish hazy but very solid round craft moving straight across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:30pm central, i was in my home in altona ia.  i went to shut the blinds on the east windows when i noticed a large lit object on the horizon. it caught my attention because it was larger and lower than an airplane.  as it approched, traveling from east to west, i observed that it appeared to be made of 3 hoizontal bars of white light in an oval shape. i then went on the back deck to get a better view because i had never seen anything like this before.  as the object got closer, the bars of light appeared to somewhat merge.  the moon was just coming up and was also almost full.  when the object passed behind the radio tower it was glowing and seemed as big as the moon and i then knew i would get a good look at it because it was going to pass in front of the moon.  the object seemed to slow down after passing by the tower and when it got to the moon, the light completely dissappeared and a very small black disc traveled across it's face.  the light reappeared after the disc had completely travelled across the moon.  it then slowed to almost a stop and then the light disinegrated. i watched the sky for about 5 minutes but nothing else occurred.  i have never seen anything like it before and still find the event unbelievable.
content.summary: Large light in sky that crossed moon & then disinegrated

content.detailedDescription: Me and two other friends had been out in the street after a terrible storm that included wind over 80mph. many trees were down and we had been standing in the driveway looking at one of them. there was still lightening and i looked up and immediately said "look!" it was an orange ball almost resembling fire racing across the sky under the (already low) clouds. it then came to a complete halt in the sky and hovered all the time flickering like fire. then the sky flashed an orange tone very different from the lightening that was happening. it got smaller and smaller and eventually flickered out and left a black circular looking cloud or trail. when looking at a plane which we saw at the same time, this object was 3 to 4 times the size of a normal airplane light. it was moving much faster than anything i had seen before in the sky. i called and reported it about an hour later after being told to do so. i was informed that over the last 11 months there have been a very very high number of reported sightings of this. on of the people i was with did get a short video of it hovering and getting smaller then disappearing.
content.summary: Orange fiery ball of light races across sky,hovers and disappears

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 2 of my neighbors were having a bonfire when i witnessed a orange globe of light flying towards us. it flew over our heads with no sound a second one flew right behind it in the same path. both objects were moving straight and than made a sharp curve to the west. the objects than stopped in place and began hovering.The lead object was in the bottom right as the follower top left. the lead began swaying or moving left and right and faded out the remaining object hovered for about another fifteen seconds and than faded out itself.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange fireball flys over 3

content.detailedDescription:
I saw three white lights in a line then one light dissapeared then the two lights changed direction. smaller object near the lights moving fast. i felt an eerie feeling and could not sleep when i got home. was in awe just staring at the lights. this occurred near los angeles while driving home. i have a photo but it won't upload to this 
site for some reason ??
content.summary: Saw three white lights, one dissapeared then two white lights got brighter and smaller object near starlike lights.

content.detailedDescription: It first started on the 27th of july, i am intrested in ufo activity so i just happened to look out of my bedroom window is was about 11.10pm and there seemed to be no stars in the sky then all of a sudden i spotted one, as i looked at it i thought i saw a hint of blue in it so i got my telescope and focused in on as much as i could and it was blue, red, white green all sorts of colours it seemed to be quite a distance i couldn't make out a shape just extremely bright lights i watches it for about a hour and it seemed to move slowly to the right then up down but very slow, following night it was very cloudy but at about 12am there was a break in the cloud and it was in the exact same place! ... i watched for only a minute as the clouds came back over the following night i stood at the window looking at that spot and it wasn't there and i really wanted to show my partner i stop there for about 10 seconds looked back and it appeared out of nowhere looking bigger then the previous nights i looks through my telescope but i still couldn't make out a shape. my partner looked at it through the telescope and he couldn't understand it ... and then last night at around 11pm again low n behold it was there much closer this time but again still can't make a shape out.... i'm going to drive towards it tonight if it shows up see if i can get some footage!
content.summary: Blue, red, white flashing rather large object hovering!

content.detailedDescription: Three turquoise colored lights at each corner of a triangle caught my eye as i was riding my bike on gillham st. near 43rd st. in the midtown area of kansas city mo. the lights came into view as i turned right onto gillham rd at 43rd st. the lights were only visible for a few moments as the object was travelling east south east and was quickly obscured by the tree-lined horizon. the very short time i could see it, it appeared to have just changed direction toward the east south east. i could see the lights for only a few seconds after it was obscured by the trees, but for a second or two, i could still see the lights through the trees - but then it was gone.
content.summary: Three turquoise colored lights at each corner of the triangle, very brief sighting obscured by trees on horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home oddly enough watching the season premiere of "chasing ufos" on natgeo. i happened to be looking outside to my backyard, through the glass doors, and saw what looked like a star, but however it appeared out of nowhere. it just appeared, it hovered for a bit and then just gradually moved around in a very irregular flight path before slowly fading out. strangely enough during the sighting of this star like ufo, a bright flash like a camera flash happened and no less that 1 or 2 seconds later what looked like a shooting star dashed across the sky. it was too low to be a shooting star. at that time of night, it was unusually bright out from a bright moon. it must have been going thousands of miles per hour, it just darted across the sky. what i did see though, was that whatever craft if was had a very odd glow to it. almost like a glow in the dark dull yellow green. like bioluminesence. it was very odd. 

however the first star like ufo i saw was very high in the air, maybe 70,000 feet, in my best guess. from where i was standing it was at a 45 degree angle in a slight ese direction. i guess it would then be hovering over the vista/san marcos area which is about 10 miles or so east from carlsbad.

the flash for the second ufo came from across the hill, over el camino real, near some houses and a power line, maybe it's a telephone line, i don't know. it looked like it came from a house. it was like a camera flash, but it was huge, so it couldn't have been a camera. who would be out at that hour taking photos anyway?

afterwards my dog started to act a bit frightened, it might have been from the flash. she's easily scared by lightning, but there was no weather of that sort in our area. very strange.
content.summary: Appeared out of nowhere, random blinking red/green lights with an irregular path of flight.

content.detailedDescription: My father owned a crab picking house at what is now bill forrest seafood. i owned a small uphostery shop that i ran out of a small construction office type of trailer behind his business. i went out side to "water the flowers" when i saw cars that were parked at the end of messick rd (the road ends about 1/4 mile from what was then my shop) and they were going back up the road from the end of messick "hauling ass" is the only words that come to mind. i looked toward the east, which from my perspective appeared to be over bells oyster gut, a small inlet of the back river, was a large quiet cigar shaped object. it appeared as if someone was welding the outside of it and molten steel hit the water. of coarse that can't actually be what ahppened but that's the words i'd use to describe what i saw. just prior to the 1st iraq war and being in visual distance of the langley afb runway we rarely saw a time when there was no air traffic, but there was absolutely none during this siting. i didn't know how big it was or how far away it was until later when it moved sw and was behind the 4 towers on the other side of the river and it stuck out of each end from my perspective from the 1st to the 4th tower. that means it must have been at least several hundreds of yards long if not dozens. i went back into the shop to call my wife and tell her what i just saw and went back out after getting no answer as she goes to bed eariler than most folks but when i went back outside it was gone. i told both of my older brothers the next day and was laughed at and rejected. the reason i'm even saying anything now is after seeing a documentary about richard lang investigating chris bledsoe, i thought maybe those cars that went screaming up the road saw what i saw, and maybe just maybe have reported it over the years. i could be off by the dates by 6 to 8 months either way. i guess when you are rejected by wife and brothers after telling them about the siting you put it out of your mind knowing that's where its got to stay if life is gonaa be normal. but now after 25 years of marraige the trust is there so its not a problem and i dont care what my brothers think. i wish the story was more exciting but it is what it is. i saw another documentary where a lady said she had what looked like sparkling star dust on her trees and realized that really is like what i saw discharging out of whatever it was when the "welding sparks" landed in the water during my siting so long ago. i hope someone out there has witnessed what i did aound those dates and has contacted mufon. i'd say at least 5 cars where moving back up messick when it occurred and they had to see what i saw they way they were moving as if they were on fire and moving faster would put it out...I know of no craft, not even the largest airship that could be behind the 4 towers and stick out of the 1st and 4th it was so long. the towers were still there the last time i looked...
content.summary: A large quiet cigar shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: Im going to first start by saying if i didnt see it myself i wouldnt believe it but im not crazy and i know what i saw, and this is coming from a person that used to laugh at ufo shows and was at one time a skeptic of ufos. needless to say my whole perspective has changed. it all started on 6/25/12 at 930 pm. i first saw a orb moving across the sky which made me curious so i continued to look around the sky. after that i heard a explosion.(not sure if relevant??)approx. 1 min later a low flying aircraft with what appeared to be 2 bright red lights on the bottom of the aircraft flew aprox. 500 ft or less right above me. it was difficult to make out a shape because the red lights illuminated the entire air craft, and it was gone just as quick as it arrived. a few minutes later aprox. 15 of the same aircrafts appeared but much higher then the first sighting. they appeared to be flying in formation but were in groups of 5. shortly after they arrived they branched off, making sharp turns, and for lack of better words they fluttered like a butterfly would. they circled around for 3, hours almost looked like they were looking for something?? some of these objects appeared to drop orbs as they passed by that remained stationary. all through the night i watched countless shooting stars shooting straight towards the ground and they would leave a smokey grey trail. towards the end of this experience the entire sky lit up several times and remained that way for a minute or so each time it occoured.Periodically i would also see what looked like a spot light and shortly after that all the aircrafts returned and left in the same formation the came in. that was the end of that night. on 6/26/12 i went back out and watched the sky and saw similar activity as the night before but not nearly as much. the only other thing i saw this night that i didnt see the night before was a really bright srar like light coming towards me. when it passed over i could only see a dark figure and was only able to make out a triangle shape because of the lights on each point. the only feature i could see was that it was flying with a tilt. if had to guess i would say roughly a 45 degree angle. it flew over at 500 ft or lower just like the original one i saw. it was only visible for about 5 seconds n then just vanished. and that was the end of my ufo experience. im still baffled and very confused about what i saw, but i will admit it was the most amazing thing ive ever seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw several flying objects in formation making sharp 90 degree turns on 6/25/2012 and a dark figure hovering above shaped like a triangle flying with a tilt. i was only able to make out the shape because of lights on each point. this occoured 6/26/2012

content.detailedDescription: Videoing back yard at the moon just set up the video this bright white orb moving very fast across the moon coming from the south going north west very high...Other airplanes lower in the area.
content.summary: Videoing in the back yard at the moon this ufo moving very fast across the moon going north west

content.detailedDescription:
June 26, 2012 ��� 23:30 pm (approx. time)
weather: clear sky, no clouds, half moon to east (not visible to me)
sky view (degrees) est: 120 ��� north/south, 90 ��� east/west
fresno, ca (northeast)


object being chased by 2 fighter jets

at approximately 23:30 pm on june 26, 2012, i let my dogs out to do their nightly business.  as usual, i went out with them to look at the stars.  i was just getting ready to go back inside when i heard a louder than usual jet engine.  

i looked up to see two military fighters flying in a north to south direction at a high rate of speed.  though i am not sure of the altitude, they appeared to be about one half inch in length.  i am not sure how fast they were going. certainly not above mach i, but close, maybe.  they were in a slight climb as they passed almost directly overhead.  all of their navigational lights and strobes were on.  

just in front of the fighters (approximately one quarter of a mile), i saw a single, pale, greenish/white, spherical, or round light that was about one third of the size of the fighters. it was pulling away, slightly, from the jets.

a few seconds later, the object executed a slight climbing right turn to the southwest, and accelerated, increasing the distance from the fighters as they turned to follow it. at that point, the object disappeared (winked out).  the jets continued to the southwest until i could no longer see them.

the whole sighting lasted no more than twenty seconds from the time i first saw the jets until the object winked out.

it is unusual to see any aircraft flying north to south at the altitude i observed, because of the proximity to fresno air terminal, and the traffic patterns.  though, at 11:30 pm, there is almost no air traffic at all.  also, the air national guard is based at fat, and they tend to keep noise levels at a minimum over the city.  the air guard flies f-16s, and lemore naval air station (nearby) flies fa-18s. hopefully, this will help determine the altitude they were flying.

i am a retired information technology analyst, and a private pilot.
content.summary: Single object - two military fighter jets in pursuit.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
walked out side to the patio at willow plaza, on the white mt. hwy.
one other individual and i noticed a glowing(bright white) starlike orb moving ne from the w. the orb dimmed out and then dimmed or traveled away.
      we both initially thought the flight path of this starlike orb was unusual as it did not have any faa regulated strobes as most aircraft is required by law.
content.summary: Starlike moving in a flight pattern

content.detailedDescription: In the back yard videoing the moon this large blue orb moving very slow what seem to be orbiting the moon. video it for about one hour saved 15 min. of it.  followed it about 1/4 going around the moon....Maybe a star but neaver seen this happen before.
content.summary: Videoing the moon this large blue orb next to the moon

content.detailedDescription:
Watching 6 round lights slowly move up the east river. changed directed and appeared near the empire state building.
then appeared over our heads as a single solid white radiating light object
over our heads as we stood on the roof of a six story building.
a transparent white aura emanated from the object and fell upon us.

there were no windows and the object looked like the star of bethlehem. its pointed edges gistened and sparkled.

this object inspired the fear of death from being thrown off the roof of the building in case it would land on the roof.

as we became more hysterical and frightened. the object seemed to be aware of our mental state and blinked off. we didnt see it anymore.
it didnt fly away. it simply disapeared.
it was the size of a tall building. 

it lasted from 9:50pm to 10pm.

after this event, i was visited by 3 reptilian beings, in the middle of the night, who scared me. right before they appeared, i became paralyzed and couldnt see, move or speak.

they had alligator skin, charcoal in color, almost black.
they were about 3 to 4 feet tall. 
they wore tight blue uniforms. only their faces and hands were uncovered.
one of them was missing feet, one was missing a head, and the last one had all body parts.
they spoke to me telepathically as they had no mouths. they had huge eyes and 2 small dots where the nose is supposed to be. i also saw no ears.

telepathically they told me that if they could paralyze me, they could paralyze our nuclear weapons.

the instant this thought was conveyed, they put me asleep, even though they never touched me. put me to sleep and next thing i know, i woke up in the morning with terrors, and fears which lasted for weeks.

i couldnt tell anyone. for fear i would be seen as insane.
as i look back, they didnt really hurt me or probe me, and i have never missed any time.

i have had other visitations and as a result wrote and entire record which was recorded and published. the record was a documentation of some of my ufo sighting and visitations.

thanks for listening.

jane allyson
content.summary: Large diamond shaped object came out of 6 lights and hovered over my head as im standing on the roof of building

content.detailedDescription:
Saw the same object twice. first time the end of february. stepped out on my back porch maybe midnight- 1 am. i saw some lights flashing to the sw. red and white.  headed north. i thought it looked pretty much like a plane. slow moving. no leaves on the trees, but the trees were obscuring my view a bit. i really wasn't paying much attention until suddenly the lights i had been watching went out and to the rear of those there was a sudden circular pattern of white lights. maybe six or seven. they lit up in sequence. very fast. 4 0r 5 times it went around then poof. just disappeared. the whole thing lasted maybe 45 seconds and i really didn't get a clear view. just looked weird. like a ferris wheel in the sky and then nothing. i thought it was strange at the time, but didn't really get a good look.

about a month later same scenario. same time. i stepped out for a breath of air and this time it was sse moving towards the ne. watched for about 3 minutes. it was above the treeline and i got a good look. white light on top then red lower and slightly ahead then white lower. looked very airplane like except the lights were separated vertically by more than a distant plane could be. i watched it for a couple of minutes or more. same pattern. white, red, white. once again i thought it looked a little strange, and then suddenly like the other time the front lights went out and to the rear there was this circular display. very fast. maybe 6 or 8 white lights in a circular pattern. not sure if they went clockwise or counter. just like the other time they ripped around several times for a few seconds and then nothing. all lights disappeared. had a pretty good look the second time. never saw a structure. just lights. never saw anything in the papers or tv about it. still, i don't know of anything that has a vertical light display like that. and i'm pretty sure that airplanes just don't turn off their lights and disappear. i don't know. might be an explanation. looked strange to me though.
content.summary: White red white flashing then changed to a spinning ferriss wheel white

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were getting groceries out of the car when he noticed a bright light in the sky to our west. he is an ameteur astronomer and knows the sky, and he said that this object should not be there. besides, it was larger than a planet, about the size of a penny held at arm's length or larger.  we watched it for about 15 minutes as it just blnked off then several seconds later came back on again.  it repeated this in a random fashion, there was no order to it.  we tried timing the seconds between when it went off and on but it was always different every time - 20 seconds, then 5, then 8, etc. then it went out for one last time and did not come back on again. there was no sound.  it appeared to be fairly close to us but it was hard to tell.   there was a weird red glow around the outside of the white center light.
content.summary: Strange large bright light dissappeared and reappeared several times

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone: 

i was walking to my the house at 10:15 pm when i saw what i thought was the b-2 stealth bomber fly over or near lake city army ammo plant in independence, missouri which is not far from my house. this is a no-fly-zone so i was surprised to see anything flying over the area. the plane had three bright lights shining down and it was very loud. 

at 10:50 pm i was getting ready for bed and turning the lights off in the house when i saw a bright white light through my window. it was hovering at approximately 200 feet above the ground in the area of lake city.  the trees are approximatley 100 feet tall and this object was another 100 feet above them. it looked very strange, so i called my wife and we both went outside to get a better look at it.  it would take at half-dollar held at arm's length to cover it up, so it was larger than a star or planet. the light was extremely bright, like a big spot light, and it had a red glow around the outside of it. there were planes in the distance at the same time as this event.  we watched this object for about 10 minutes then the object suddenly shot straight up into the air at a very high rate of speed, then to the south, then to the west, than back to its original location.  there was no sound at all. at this point we were rather shaken. then it moved away from west to east very slowly and out of sight. this was definately not a plane or helicopter.  it moved too fast and there was no sound.  i'd like to know if other people saw this.
content.summary: Large bright white object with red glow hovered then shot straight up into the sky

content.detailedDescription: Halfway thru the concert an illuminated object slowly started appearing from asoutherly direction aprox 25 miles per hour at aprox 3 to 500 ft above and crossed dirictly over the pier while van morrison performed on the stage on the pier. the object an oval set of lights moved steadily on an unwaivering path no audidle sounds of engines or propulsion were heard unfortunately video cameras or recorders were not allowed or on the market during the mid 80s .The object seemed dark to transparent in the center and appeared to be atleast 300 ft long. some other people at the concert also observerd the object and pointed at it. it took about 30 minutes to cross over the pier from first visibility to the time it finally disappeared into yhe horizon its an unforgetable event for and i can still recall it clearly. my coworker and close friend was seated next to me and we were both in awe. i never heard any other reports about it.In the news or in the papers all i can say is i will never forget it and what isaw was not of this world.
content.summary: U,fo,slowly appeared from south along the hudson river crossing over the pier during van morrison concert and slowly disappeared on anothernly straight line path

content.detailedDescription:
Videoing out at the sand city beash area of the monterey bay and noties a large white light coming from the south and going north by north west along the beach line. the ufo was white with some red edges i vidoe it for some time untill it was out of view of the video cam. then about 9:05pm.
very high what look like a blue orb going north from the south seem to be looking around....Again it under review so i can't show it at this time.
content.summary: Large white light coming from the south going north

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo appeared to be bright object in dark sky around 11:30 p.M. over a golf course. very bright lights on small? object blinked, and i believe two very bright red lights were on each side of object. object was shaped like a cone hovering for a long time in one spot. no sound was emitted. then object moved very slowly to the left, then hovered again. i was walking the dogs. we waited for about 15 minutes in which it moved very slowly, and finally rose higher skyward and appeared to disappear, or dim as it rose. it was a perfectly clear night, but appeared to disappear into "clouds" that weren't there, as it rose and just "went out".
when i came into the house, my friend had been observing it from the deck of the house and was shocked as it was her first "sighting".
i am always looking as i have seen several over the years.
i contacted our weather authority at the local news station, but he said none were reported by anyone else that he knew of.
trust me, it was there.
strange that i have lived her for several years, and this is the second sighting i have had in two weeks or less...Both being very different in structure, and one at night and one during the day. both vanishing before my eyes.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared to spin/hover. flashed bright white lights with what appeared to be two red lights across from each other.

content.detailedDescription:
Out in the back yard videoing saw something odd so a took a photo of it.
next day reviewing the film the ufo had a smaller ufo comming out for it.
have another photo but it's a v shape glowing you can make out the out line of the v shape. and yes it's under review at this time...Sorry you have to wate and see...There very good shots...No if or maybe's.
content.summary: Videoing in the back yard again toke a photo shot of something odd- ufo something comming out of it .

content.detailedDescription:
I took several photos of my car at a scenic location. several of which where taken in quick order. the first two were nearly identical and no more than a second or two apart. i did not notice anything out of the ordinary.
weeks later when enhancing the first photo for black and white effects and 
sharpening the image i got the neat picture i was looking for which enhanced the suspension details. when i then went back to the full picture to see if it was what i wanted as a total picture i noticed something above the mountain in the background that stood out.
i looked at the original and in that picture it appeared to be a small horizontal cloud hanging parallel to the mountain top.
i checked the other photos the second of which was taken a second of two after the first photo. no such cloud. it was a hazy but cloudless day.
when zoomed it appears as a cigar shaped object. a zoom of the enhanced black and white startled me. i don't think it was a cloud which would have appeared and disappeared within a second or so. it appears to be a solid object. it is unidentified to me.
i've checked the camera and nothing is on the lens or the sensor.
the camera was a nikon d90 digital.
i have attached the original in hd and the enhanced black and white
showing the "cloud" and the picture taken a second of so later.
content.summary: When exhaming photos i found an object in first photo which wasn't present in 2nd photo a second later

content.detailedDescription:
Was playing golf. i sighted ufo above and in the distance, yet appeared not too far. pointed it out to my golf partner, who also did not understand what were were looking at. appeared to be two or three rectangular gray/black parachutes conntected. hovered and appeared to be coming toward us, but very slowly as decended. we could not figure out what we were looking at as it was soon apparent this was not any type of parachute. however, there did seem to be some type of ropes/appendages holding the two or three rectangules together. they floated, or seemed to, towards us for a few minutes. we played the hole and drove down to the green. i saw them just before driving down the hill, and in the next second they were gone from the sky with no sign of anything at all.
the sky was clear and very open. it couldn't have disappeared that fast as big as it was without still being in view in such a short time.
content.summary: Appeared to be two or three rectangular parachutes attached, one in front of the other dark w/appendages, but upon further viewing, unrecognizable.

content.detailedDescription:
Was playing golf. i sighted ufo above and in the distance, yet appeared not too far. pointed it out to my golf partner, who also did not understand what were were looking at. appeared to be two or three rectangular gray/black parachutes conntected. hovered and appeared to be coming toward us, but very slowly as decended. we could not figure out what we were looking at as it was soon apparent this was not any type of parachute. however, there did seem to be some type of ropes/appendages holding the two or three rectangules together. they floated, or seemed to, towards us for a few minutes. we played the hole and drove down to the green. i saw them just before driving down the hill, and in the next second they were gone from the sky with no sign of anything at all.
the sky was clear and very open. it couldn't have disappeared that fast as big as it was without still being in view in such a short time.
content.summary: Appeared to be two or three rectangular parachutes attached, one in front of the other dark w/appendages, but upon further viewing, unrecognizable.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 12:15am eastern time my wife and i went to sit out on the deck for some fresh air after a very hot and humid day.  the temperature had gotten in to the nineties on the 20th of june 2012.  we sat over looking the woods for almost an hour, it was the first night that the fire flys had come out.  as we sat we both began to notice that all the sounds of the woods ceased.  all the crickets stopped, all the peepers stopped in the pond behind the house.  it was at this time i noticed something in the yard.  at first i thought it may be a skunk because all i could make out was a little bit of white.  as i stood up off my chair to investigate, the patch of white that i had seen began to back up and admit a very dim glow.  at first i was bit taken back my this and told my wife to stand up and take a look.  by the time she stood up the glow of the life form had gotten a small amount brighter and backed off to the other side of the fence where it stopped and seem to focus towards us.  my wife stepped towards the glow now about 5 yards in front of us and again then glow got a bit brighter.  it was very noticeable that when you took a few steps towards forward it got one step brighter.  we felt that this thing was observing us but we did not feel threatened.  for  twenty minutes or so this had gone on and that is when we decided to try to get closer.  no sooner that we thought about getting closer a second glow appeared out of nowhere five feet to the left of the first glow.  the second glow was a lot brighter and was clearly moving side to side.  at this point my wife and i got frightened and walked back up on to the deck not taking out eyes of the two glowing forms for a second.  once back on the deck the second glow started moving towards us at a fast pace about  ten to fifteen yards in front of us.  once it cleared the fence and was clearly in our yard we retreated to the house.  we were to scared to go out side again so we decided to call it a night.
june 21st 2012. 
after the events of the previous night my wife and decided that we would investigate in the back yard to see if what we saw the night before would return.  the night was very reminiscent of the first night.  there were no sounds of the maine night life to be heard. we laid out on the deck observing the sky for a an hour when my wife noticed something up in the air. best described as an extremely white bright light shooting across the sky. the main shape of the object was oblong or rice like.  it was brighter then anything we had ever seen and moving very fast.  the most bizarre characteristic of this bright oblong light where what appeared to be almost appendage or tentacle like things coming of from each side of it.
they moved side to side extending and retracting as it made its way across the sky west to east out towards the ocean. we both found this to be very strange and proceeded to do some research on the ipad that we had brought out.  it was at this time that i had focused my attention back towards the woods where we had seen the glow the night before.  after looking for only a couple of seconds the glow started to appear again slowly on the opposite side of the fence. i alerted my wife to the arrival of the glow but this time it was not as bright as the night before.  we were a few yards further away then the first night and we had observed that the closer we got the brighter it got, the further away we got the dimmer it got.  there was only the glow which we both felt was the
content.summary: An on going event that started 6/20/12. we are scared any help or info please.
